parameters.name: CallbackFunction
parameters.description: Name of the function to call (see Remarks )

title: ISldWorks.AddCallback
description: Registers a general purpose callback handler.
signature:
void AddCallback( 
   System.Int32
Cookie
,
   System.String
CallbackFunction
)

parameters.name: CallbackFunction
parameters.description: Name of the function to call (see Remarks )

remarks:
The callback function has three arguments:
Callback function parameter name in example
Data Type
Description
cmd
Integer
Command ID as defined in
swAppCallBackCmd_e
data
Integer
Data related to the event
dsp
LPDISPATCH
Not currently used
